name: Parkour World
description:
Out of many new game projects, this is one of the best. I am using it as the subject of my first game development blog here at Itch.io. Follow along for indy development fun!!
Anyway, the game works and is playable, but lacks all the fun stuff that will make it awesome. If you have any suggestions or comments, please share. I have a big list of things to add and improve. I thought jumping into the air would be fun but turns out without being able to see what is below you to land on.. not so much :)
